SEARCH
Package com.clientui.clientui.proxies

Interface MicroservicesProxy

@FeignClient(name="mgateway", url="${mgateway.url:http://mgateway:9010}", configuration=FeignConfig.class) public interface MicroservicesProxy
Feign client interface for communicating with backend microservices in the MicroDiab application. This interface defines methods to interact with 'mpatient', 'mnotes', and 'mrisk' microservices.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addNote(NoteBean newNote)
    Adds a new note for a patient in the 'mnotes' microservice.
    void
    addPatient(PatientBean patient)
    Adds a new patient to the 'mpatient' microservice.
    RiskLevelBean
    getRiskLevel(Long patId)
    Retrieves the risk level for a specific patient from the 'mrisk' microservice.

    retrieveNotesPatId(Long patId)
    Retrieves all notes for a specific patient from the 'mnotes' microservice.

    Retrieves a specific patient by their ID from the 'mpatient' microservice.

  • Method Details

    • retrievePatientList

      @GetMapping("/mpatient/patients") List<PatientBean> retrievePatientList()
      Retrieves the list of all patients from the 'mpatient' microservice.
      Returns:
      A list of PatientBean objects representing all patients.

    • retrievePatientId

      @GetMapping("/mpatient/patient/{id}") PatientBean retrievePatientId(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Retrieves a specific patient by their ID from the 'mpatient' microservice.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the patient.
      Returns:
      A PatientBean object representing the requested patient.

    • addPatient

      @PostMapping("/mpatient/patient") void addPatient(@RequestBody PatientBean patient)
      Adds a new patient to the 'mpatient' microservice.
      Parameters:
      patient - The PatientBean object representing the patient to add.

    • updatePatient

      @PutMapping("/mpatient/patient/{id}") void updatePatient(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @RequestBody PatientBean patient)
      Updates an existing patient in the 'mpatient' microservice.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the patient to update.
      patient - The PatientBean object containing updated patient data.

    • retrieveNotesPatId

      @GetMapping("/mnotes/notes/{patId}") List<NoteBean> retrieveNotesPatId(@PathVariable("patId") Long patId)
      Retrieves all notes for a specific patient from the 'mnotes' microservice.
      Parameters:
      patId - The unique identifier of the patient.
      Returns:
      A list of NoteBean objects representing the patient's notes.

    • addNote

      @PostMapping("/mnotes/notes") void addNote(@RequestBody NoteBean newNote)
      Adds a new note for a patient in the 'mnotes' microservice.
      Parameters:
      newNote - The NoteBean object representing the note to add.

    • getRiskLevel

      @GetMapping("/mrisk/risk/{patId}") RiskLevelBean getRiskLevel(@PathVariable("patId") Long patId)
      Retrieves the risk level for a specific patient from the 'mrisk' microservice.
      Parameters:
      patId - The unique identifier of the patient.
      Returns:
      A RiskLevelBean object representing the patient's risk level.
